msbt.message: It's the Year of the MOUSE! THAT'S RIGHT, WORLD! It's MY year! The Year of ! I bet during Year of the Mouse I'm going to be extra adorbs!
! Year of the Cow! Le pride is strong, so I'm singing my family song ♪ MOOoooOOooooO! ♪ <10_5 />Moo!
! The Year of the Tiger! My time is HERE!I want to be sure Madness sweeps . Maybe I need a publicist?
Year of the Rabbit? Heh. More like Year of the FABbit! EveryBUNNY's going to have a good time!I sure HOP this year's great for everyBUNNY—hang on! Heh. I did that one already.
is the Year of the Horse! Maybe this is going to be the year I get serious about being a pop star! "The Miraculous Thoroughbred Taking the Music Industry by Storm, !" AWW. YEAAAH!
It's the Year of the Sheep! Kind of exciting, having a year about me!I mean, every year is about me, but you know. This one basically has my name in the title.
Check. It. Out! It's the Year of the Monkey! That's my year! I'm a monkey!I don't want to brag more than usual, but I'm sort of everybody's favorite pop-star-in-training monkey!
It's the Year of the Bird! The year where I'm the star! That must mean it's the year of my pop-star debut!
OHMIGOSH! Year of the Dog means it's MY year, right?! I bet this is the year my dreams FINALLY come true!
It's the Year of the Pig! I'm going to grease this year up and set it loose!Hehthat, um, sounded a lot less weird in my head.
